akas: Flames of Ambition World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Flames of Ambition World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: NaYoung wants to do everything possible to stop her son, MinJae, from running off and marrying Baek Inki, including defaming Baek, appealing to pity, kneeling down and even attempting suicide. We then flashback to reveal the shattered history of NaYoung and her troubled times from back in the 1970s.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Young Min explains the environmental engineering he will be doing in the states to Tae Jin. Na Young confesses to quitting school. Na Young and Young Min realize they knew each other when they were children.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Después de hablar con el presidente, Na Young se está contenta con la vida, pero regresa a casa para ver las etiquetas de garantía rojas en casi todo el interior de su casa. Mientras tanto, Goo Joon sigue sufriendo las cargas familiares, que incluyen la muerte de Sang Hoon y las deudas colectivas del resto de los miembros de la familia.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Young Min hace una visita a un viejo némesis y recibe una advertencia para no volver jamás. Na Young le dice a Young Min que está pensando en regresar a Seúl. Na Young intenta que Young Min acepte no tener hijos con ella.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: La escena comienza en el año 1997 nuevamente en Nueva Jersey mientras Na Young trata de llegar a un acuerdo que traerá Young Min de regreso a Seúl, siempre y cuando no tenga que trabajar para su padre cuando regrese. Más tarde, Na Young comienza a acechar a InSook, que ha estado bebiendo y se tambalea alrededor.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Min Jae narrowly misses getting hurt after he falls into the water. Na Young refuses to let Eon Ni introduce her to her adopted daughter. Eun Ni struggles with telling her daughter the truth about her father's past.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: InKi has a difficult time as she denies the rumors floating around about her, though she does not take any further action as she knows there is nothing that she can do. However, NaYoung continues to press on and says that InKi is low, which drives the woman into anger.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Na Young is encouraged to sell all her shares from her father in law's company. Young Jun becomes romantically interested in Na Young, who does not immediately resist his advances.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Las mentiras de Jung Sook salen a la luz, lo que causa que Na Young se dé cuenta de que ella nunca se habría casado con Young Min o sacrificado a su propio hijo para sobrevivir si la verdad hubiera salido antes. El argumento se torna más serio y termina con Na Young pidiendo a Jung Sook que no hable ni la vea nunca más.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Young Min acusa a Na Young de tratar de crear una ruptura entre él y su hermano. El General Nam hace una visita a el padre enfermo de Young Min. El Presidente Kim empieza a sospechar y se pregunta cuales son las verdaderas intenciones del Presidente Kim.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Young Min, sin darse cuenta con quien Na Young estaba hablando, sale a tomar el té con su esposa mientras él revela que ella tuvo un aborto involuntario. Esto conduce a Young Min a creer que Na Young puede haber tenido una aventura debido a su vasectomía en los años 90 cuando se encontraba en los Estados Unidos.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: El líder de la pandilla local, dice a In Ki que ella debe mantener un perfil bajo por el momento, ya que es incapaz de producir alguna película, entrevista o cualquier otro tipo de proyectos. En otros lugares, Duk Song trata de recuperar el respeto de Na Young diciéndole que realmente la amaba a ella.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: In Ki admite que ha desarrollado sentimientos por Min Jae, pero los dos se dan cuenta que no pueden hacer nada por el odio que Na Young siente por ella. De todas maneras, Min Jae está determinado para encontrar una solución que los pueda unir sin la interferencia de Na Young.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Aer Ri le pide al presidente que la ayuda a pagar sus deudas con la condición de que se asegure que Young Min será parte del gobierno. In Ki y Min Jae se acercan aún más luego de ir a un concierto juntos.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Despite being in the right place at the right time, MinJae does not hear the truth about the story behind his secret birth. Later, MinJae purposely fuels NaYoung's anger by delivering a bouquet of flowers to InSook in front of the woman; however, NaYoung concedes without any further action-for now.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Na Young denies the accusations brought forth against her by In Sook. Min Jae and Na Young attempt to call a truce with each other. Aer Ri tries to find out why Na Young pretended that she didn't know Duk Song.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: In Sook asks for money from Na Young. Young Jun decides he wants to call it quits with Aer Ri, but she begs him not to go for the sake of her reputation. Na Young becomes concerned when Young Min does not come home one night.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Na Young reports to her first day at work over the company, ready to make major changes. The president leaves Min Jae with some valuable business advice. Young Min agrees to loan money to In Sook, much to the horror of Na Young.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Young Jun and Jung Sook have a happy reunion in Ulsan while his Aer Ri desperately tries to make contact with Young Jun. Na Young tries to buy the talent agency owned by President Jang.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Na Young firma a In Ki con su agencia. Na Young sospecha que Young Dae es el que está detrás de la tración al presidente en vez de Aer Ri como originalmente pensaba.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Na Young descubre que su hermana, Jung Sook, posiblemente tuvo una relación secreta con Young Jun. Young Dae trata de convencer a su padre que no es el que lo traicionó dentro de su negocio.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: La controversia dentro del negocio se vuelve pública y Young Dae acepta la responsabilidad. Una conferencia de prensa se programa para aclarar el asunto y hacer creer al público que las cosas andan bien dentro de la compañía.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: In Sook quiere a Min Jae bajo su cuidado nuevamente antes de que fallezca. Young Min advierte a In Sook sobre reunirse con Min Jae. Na Young advierte a In Sook sobre encontrarse con In Sook.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Na Young surprises In Sook by telling her she is willing to let her live. Na Young wants In Sook to have surgery on her brain to fix her condition.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Young Joon y Jung Sook continúan su relación secreta. Yae Ri se encuentra con Young Joon y le aconseja que no debería estar involucrada románticamente con Jung Sook. Le parece muy gracioso a Na Young que Min Jae llegó borracho la noche anterior.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: In a fit of anger, Na Young owns up to hitting In Sook on the night she got hurt. Na Young is not remorseful and tells In Sook she would do it to her again.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Ae Ri continues to be jealous over Jung Sook's relationship with Young Joon. Ae Ri begs Jung Sook to never see Young Joon again and he reluctantly agrees to respect her wishes.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Na Young attempts to save In Sook's life. Young Min is confused when she tries to do this. Na Young tries to make Young Min leave the hospital, but he refuses to go.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: In Sook dies and Min Jae attends the funeral. Min Jae is upset when he returns home, but it's Young Min he blames for In Sook's death rather than his mother.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Young Min and Min Jae get into an argument. Min Jae runs away, upset and Young Min leaves as well. Na Young attempts to find Min Jae when he doesn't return and In Ki is her first stop.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Min Jae returns to work at the company, but being around Young Min is stressful for him. Young Min encourages Min Jae to think about going back to school or start a new job if he can't handle being around him.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Young Joon tells In Ki that Na Young is her real mother. In Ki believes that Jung Sook might know why Na Young abandoned her and she asks him for details.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Minjae makes a stunning announcement to repair the damage from the media story alleging Ingui's making of a sex tape. Meanwhile, when Youngmin causes an uproar as he restructures the family business by releasing founding members of Dae Suh Yang, his brother Youngjoon pleads with him to reconsider, only to discover that Youngmin has more control than he would want to imagine.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Ingui discovers Nayoung is her mother, resulting in a big confrontation between Ingui and Nayoung that ends with threats and with Nayoung still denying Ingui is her daughter. Ingui plans to reveal all in a press conference, while Nayoung will let nothing stand in her way to protect her lifestyle.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: A press conference is held by In Ki. She wants to expose Yoon Sik and Hyun Phil for their corruption within the company. The public is interested in learning about their dissuasion.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Young Min and Song Jin Ho begin behaving suspiciously, which piques Na Young's curiosity. Na Young tries to figure out what has been going on between Song Jin Ho and Young Min.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: After In Sook's death, Min Jae is completely devastated. Tae Jin attempts to counsel Min Jae after her death and tells him he should try to rise above it and not let it deter him.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: El suegro de Na Young le pide que deje a Min Jae y Young Min. Na Young se siente confundida, y su suegro le dice que es lo mejor es para que Min Jae pueda avanzar sin ella.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Young Min le pide a su padre que deje su cargo de presidente. Young Min decide que Young Dae es el más adecuado para la posición. Min Jae y Young Min se conectan durante unos tragos.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Min Jae y In Ki deciden casarse. Na Young no está contento. Tae Jin aprueba el matrimonio y los apoya.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Yoon Na Young confronts the Chairman about Min Jae but he collapses during their argument. Kim Young Dae takes over the Chairman's office without consulting other people at the company.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Kim Young Joon calls a friend after finding the restaurant she operated in Ulsan. In Ki faces a difficult decision as she learns of a new movie filming in the United States.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Yoon Na Young plans to keep the Chairman as well as Young Joon away as a stockholders meeting continues. Minjae uses DNA to reveal Young Min is not his father.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: El Presidente Kim Tae Jin le pregunta al Dr. Yoon que oculte las revelaciones del examen de ADN. Young Min se entera sobre el pasado de Yoon Na Young y de los eventos llevando al nacimiento del hijo ilegítimo.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: In Ki y Minjae van a comprar anillos pero ella no parece estar feliz con la situación. Yoon Na Young se preocupa que no puede permitir el matrimonio entre un hermano y hermana.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: In Ki confronts Yoon Na Young about revealing the truth. Young Min is told to stay with his father at the party as Min Jae causes more problems for the family.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Un sorprendido Min Jae se entera que In Ki es en realidad su hermana. El Presidente Kim Tae Jin le pide a Yoon Na Young que no se divorcie de Young Min y que continúe siendo una buena esposa para él.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Young Min offers to help In Ki get her film produced as they try reuniting their family. Kim Tae Jin faints and Dr. Yoon feels it would be best for him to stay at home.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Los miembros de la familia y los ejecutivos de la compañía se reunen para que el Presidente lea su testamento. Young Min es nombrado el sucesor pero decide leer el nombre de Young Joon en vez de el suyo.

imdb.plot outline: The story of a conglomerate family that falls apart when the members are caught up in a furious battle for succession. Kim Tae-jin's children all covet his fortune and the power that he possesses as the company president, and they would do anything, however cruel and inhumane, to wrest it from the others. At the forefront of this desperate game is Yoon Na-young, the ruthless and ambitious wife of Kim Young-min, Tae-jin's third son. Her unquenchable thirst for power and wealth drove her to the point of no return, manipulating both husband and son to achieve her own desires.
imdb.title: Flames of Desire
plot: The story of a conglomerate family that falls apart when the members are caught up in a furious battle for succession. Kim Tae-jin's children all covet his fortune and the power that he possesses as the company president, and they would do anything, however cruel and inhumane, to wrest it from the others. At the forefront of this desperate game is Yoon Na-young, the ruthless and ambitious wife of Kim Young-min, Tae-jin's third son. Her unquenchable thirst for power and wealth drove her to the point of no return, manipulating both husband and son to achieve her own desires.::Anonymous
